citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00am on
02/19/2014.
The licensee later contacted APHIS VMO to give cell phone number for future inspections.
Exit interview conducted by telephone with the licensee.
